title: Information technology and teacher professional skills in early school education
Rozwiązanie spółki wodnej w prawie polskim
Geneza, pojęcie i funkcje Krajowego Systemu Zielonych Inwestycji
Changes in the Audit of Accounts Regulations in Poland and the Guarantees of Freedom to Conduct a Business

items.abstract: <jats:p>The rapidly changing political and economic circumstances in central Europe during the late 1980s served as a strong natural motivation for attempts to present this reality as accessible and inviting in order to encourage foreign investment. It was also a reason why the Polish Society of Economic, Legal and Court Translators published in the early 1990s a series of translations of Polish economic law into English as source material for creating a consistent system of legal terminology called POLTERM. The following is a description of the efforts that go into creating a uniform terminological system, the institutional frame-work of this project, the source material used for its creation, the rules and procedures of the secondary term formation, and certain problems encountered in the work of terminologists and translators.</jats:p>
title: Standardization of Polish legal terminology
container-title: Terminology International Journal of Theoretical and Applied Issues in Specialized Communication

title: TEPIS Translators Society and POLTERM System
container-title: Terminology International Journal of Theoretical and Applied Issues in Specialized Communication
